Card.Name: Brainstorm
Card.RulesText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Contagion
Card.RulesText: You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

Card.Name: Demonic Consultation
Card.RulesText: Choose a card name. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the chosen name. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

Card.Name: Donate
Card.RulesText: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.

Card.Name: Duress
Card.RulesText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Force of Will
Card.RulesText: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Hoodwink
Card.RulesText: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Illusions of Grandeur
Card.RulesText: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Illusions of Grandeur enters the battlefield, you gain 20 life. When Illusions of Grandeur leaves the battlefield, you lose 20 life.

Card.Name: Mana Vault
Card.RulesText: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

Card.Name: Necropotence
Card.RulesText: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

Card.Name: Vampiric Tutor
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

Card.Name: Gemstone Mine
Card.RulesText: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

Card.Name: Underground River
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
